name: housiegame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: housie game
des:
housie/tambola is a very popular game. Lots of people play this game daily. we just tried to build a Alexa skill which will play a role of moderator. As we all know that at least one person need to moderate this game, means a person need to sacrifice his game to speak the numbers but if you have this skill in your echodot you don't need to worry anymore. we try our best to add all feature that a common man can use while playing this game. we add these following various feature:
-we add feature to check previous number.
-to repeat the number
-to check a particular number
-we also add phrases to make this game more interactive
i request all of you please try this game.
Currently this housie alexa skill is available in English language only. This skill is supportable to ll amazon echo dot/alexa . You can use physcial housie tickets which are widely availabe in stores. You can also use e-tickets(if available).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
